query:
UPDATE v2_job_flow_runtime SET
                flow_status = jsonb_set(
                    jsonb_set(
                        COALESCE(flow_status, '{}'::jsonb),
                        array[$1],
                        COALESCE(flow_status->$1, '{}'::jsonb)
                    ),
                    array[$1, 'started_at'],
                    to_jsonb(now()::text)
                )
            WHERE id = $2
